title: Riot please help...
body:
I haven't been able to connect to a classic or Aram game. I can only connect to a Co-op vs AI game for some reason.
It keeps popping with a message: "Connection Timeout: The request to the PVP.net server timed out."

In the bottom hand corner (where the exclamation mark is) -I have several event logs of the message constantly saying:
"You've been disconnected from chat. Please wait or attempt to manually reconnect using the "Reconnect" button.

I've tried connecting to a game so many times that the connection timeout to the server has put a 30 min timer on my account now thinking that ive failed to connect to a game.

I've tried reading other forums for help mainly the IP helper in servies.
Even downloaded the Hextech Repair tool. Tried re-installing the game from scratch.
Nothing happens. Same result.

Please help Riot. 
It was never like this before. I was always able to play your game smoothly with no hiccups.
Any help is much appreciated.
Thank you!

replies.body: A connection time out suggests that your network is being blocked from reaching the game servers, and staying connected if it does get through.  Go over the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help get this tuned up.  Let me know if your issue persists.
